title: Trump praises Putin's strategy in Ukraine: 'Smart' | CNN
description: CNN's John Berman talks to Gloria Borger and Maggie Haberman about recent reaction from prominent members of the Republican party to Russian President Vladimir Putin's aggressive moves in Ukraine, and President Biden's response to it.
content:
